locations.name: Muscat
locations.description: Oman's capital city, where the tour begins, known for its blend of traditional architecture (mosques, souks) and coastal scenery.

locations.name: Wahiba Sands
locations.description: A vast desert region mentioned for dune drives, sunsets, and a potential overnight stay under the stars, likely in a desert camp.

locations.name: Nizwa
locations.description: Historic former capital of Oman located near the Hajar Mountains, known for its fort and traditional souk. Serves as a base for exploring the region.

locations.name: Maldives (Resort Island)
locations.description: Represents the stay in the Maldives archipelago, likely at a private resort island (coordinates are approximate for the general region/typical resort atolls, south of Malé), focused on relaxation, beaches, and water activities.
